Senior Software Engineer

About Us:
Innovate Tech is a rapidly growing technology company focused on building cloud-based solutions for enterprise clients. We're looking for an experienced software engineer to join our team and help drive our next generation of products.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer with strong expertise in full-stack development to join our engineering team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance, scalable applications while collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
• Design and develop scalable, high-performance web applications
• Build and maintain RESTful APIs to support our client applications
• Optimize existing codebases for maximum performance and scalability
• Lead and mentor junior developers, providing code reviews and technical guidance
• Implement automated testing and continuous integration/deployment pipelines
• Participate in architecture discussions and provide technical solutions
• Collaborate with product management and UX teams to define feature specifications
• Troubleshoot and debug critical production issues
• Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
• 5+ years of experience in software development
• Strong proficiency in Python and JavaScript/TypeScript
• Experience with front-end frameworks such as React or Angular
• Experience with back-end frameworks such as Django, Flask, or Express
• Strong understanding of database design and optimization (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
• Experience with AWS or other cloud platforms
• Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Experience with CI/CD tools and methodologies
• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
• Strong communication and collaboration abilities
• Agile/Scrum development experience

Nice to Have:
• Experience with microservices architecture
• Data visualization experience
• AWS certifications
• Experience with real-time data processing
• Open-source contributions
• DevOps experience

Benefits:
• Competitive salary and equity options
• Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
• 401(k) matching
• Professional development and learning stipend
• Flexible work arrangements
• Unlimited PTO policy
• Modern, collaborative work environment
• Regular team events and activities

Location: San Francisco, CA (Remote options available)

Innovate Tech is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity in the workplace.
